question.title: How can I connect Supabase to a java project (I'm not using any Framwork)
question.body:
I cannot connect to supabase when using jdbc

jdbc:postgresql://aws-0-ap-southeast-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres?user=postgres.cjuvpugyzospthkjonkz&password=[YOUR-PASSWORD]

My code:

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {

        try {
            // Establish Connection
            Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:postgresql://aws-0-ap-southeast-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres?user=postgres.cjuvpugyzospthkjonkz&password=[YOUR-PASSWORD]");
            System.out.println("Connected to the PostgreSQL server successfully.");
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
            System.out.println("PostgreSQL JDBC Driver is not found. Include it in your library path.");
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            System.out.println("Connection to PostgreSQL failed!");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

Someone please give me the solution to fix this code
